column4: hello. i just followed the upgrade instructions found on wiki, but then totem-xine was uninstalled because it conflicts with ubuntu-desktop. any suggestions?
remove ubuntu-desktop if you prefer to use totem-xine
but its strange if i do whats on wiki, my kernel and a lot of stuff is updated, while if i use synaptic normally, it does not update
and can one change gdm and splash? i dont have a problem with those, but i wanted to install ubuntu on my boss pc
yes; gdmsetup for the former, gconf-editor -> /apps/gnome-session/options/splash_image for the latter
but ubuntu has only 1 gdm theme
it's true that there's only one Ubuntu theme, but you can switch to any of the GNOME ones ...
it would be a nice ideia to include this theme and the previous
thank you, im helping a friend setting up ubuntu :)
and after installing it, you need to deal with blaster and co
I'd expect there to be two ticked boxes by default
deb warty main restricted and deb-src warty main restricted
